it.polito.verifoo.rest.common

Class NodeNetworkObject

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.AbstractMap<K,V>
      • java.util.HashMap<Node,NetworkObject>
        • it.polito.verifoo.rest.common.NodeNetworkObject
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable, java.util.Map<Node,NetworkObject>

    public class NodeNetworkObject
extends java.util.HashMap<Node,NetworkObject>
    This class generates a Map of a new network object and its associated node. The network object are generated inside this class by extracting from the schema the functional type and by processing the configurations.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

                         int nRules,
                         java.util.List<NodeConstraints.NodeMetrics> nodeMetrics,
                         java.util.List<Property> properties)
        Collect the information to generate a network object
        Parameters:
        ctx - Z3 Context
        nctx - NetworkContext
        autoctx - the z3 autocontext
        net - Network
        nodes - List of nodes from that we will generate NetworkObject
        nRules - the number of rules that needs to be autogenerated
        nodeMetrics - the node resources requirements
        properties - list of policies
